name: Primite Fusion
effectText: Fusion Summon 1 Dragon Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by shuffling its materials from your field, GY, and/or banishment into the Deck, including a Normal Monster. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 Level 5 or higher "Primite" monster from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Primite Fusion" once per turn.
